item.title: Add more bows to this max list
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

public int calculateRangeMaxHit() { c.getItems().resetBonus(); c.getItems().getBonus(); c.getItems().writeBonus(); int rangeLevel = c.playerLevel[4]; double modifier = 1.0; int itemUsed = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4734 || c.usingBow ? c.playerEquipment[c.playerArrows] : c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]; if (c.prayerActive[3]) modifier += 0.05; else if (c.prayerActive[11]) modifier += 0.10; else if (c.prayerActive[19]) modifier += 0.15; if (fullVoidRange()) modifier += 0.25; if (fullArmadyl()) modifier += 0.20; double c = modifier * rangeLevel; int rangeStr = getRangeStr(itemUsed); double max = (c + 8) * (rangeStr + 64) / 340; if (max < 1) max = 1; return (int)max; }

Read full topic
